snippet: Peter Liguori, named Thursday as chief executive of the reconstituted Tribune Company, said that managing the company's newspapers well is crucial but that he would also explore acquiring more television stations.
abstract: Peter Liguori, named Thursday as chief executive of the reconstituted Tribune Company, said that managing the company's newspapers well is crucial but that he would also explore acquiring more television stations.

headline.main: New Tribune Chief Signals Greater Television Focus
